title: Ticket #6182: condor_q -analyze by default doesn't look at request_memory, request_*
description:
When running condor_q -analyze, it is only looking at the job requirements. Things like request_cpus, request_memory, request_disk aren't added to the job requirements, since they are enforced at match time by the machine requirements.

So, some improvement is needed for this very common case. Some ideas:

  1. Explicitly recognize and use these attributes in the analysis.
  2. Do some type of "-reverse" by default (maybe not on the entire pool)
  3. By default require a slot ad that the user thinks "ought to match" and provide exact info on why it doesn't.
